Automatic Information, Organization and Retrieval .A Salton, G. Information retrieval is a field concerned with the structure, analysis, organization, storage, searching, and retrieval of information. This book deals with the computer processing of large information files, with special emphasis on automatic text handling methods. Described in particular are procedures for dictionary construction and dictionary look-up, statistical and syntactic language analysis methods, information search and matching procedures, automatic information dissemination systems, and methods for user interaction with the mechanized system.  As such, the text includes elements of linguistics, mathematics, and computer programming. .X 26	2	175 29	1	175 34	1	175 38	1	175 39	2	175 45	1	175 50	2	175 51	2	175 53	1	175 57	1	175 59	1	175
